topic.title: Chest And Lungs Assessment - conformance rules

lines.i: Qualitative assessment of condition of patient's chest and lungs

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.115"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11230)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67528-0" Physical findings of Chest+Lungs NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10381)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11231)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestLungAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.29 DYNAMIC (CONF:10382)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.08
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11230)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67528-0" Physical findings of Chest+Lungs NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10381)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11231)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestLungAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.29 DYNAMIC (CONF:10382)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.08

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.115"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1283149315"/> <code code="67528-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Physical findings of Chest+Lungs NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation>
